Men have a higher risk for stroke, but more women die from stroke. Gender.  Men have a higher risk for stroke, but more women die from stroke. - Race. People from certain ethnic groups have a higher risk of stroke. For African Americans, stroke is more common and more deadly  even in young and middle-aged adults  than for any ethnic or other racial group
